title: fo-10: UI Components
description:
Create FO-10 app directory structure and adapt UI components from FO-09 for the fixed 4-question flow.

## Spec
`docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md`

## Key Files
- `app/fo-10/types.ts` — adapted from FO-09 with FO10_QUESTIONS constant
- `app/fo-10/components/` — copy/adapt FragmentInput, HeartAnimation, step components from FO-09
- `app/fo-10/components/step-goal.tsx` — new component for step 4 (predefined topic chips)

## Worker Notes
- Workers have CLAUDE.md context and persistent memory
- Many components can be copied directly from FO-09
- Key difference: fixed questions instead of AI-generated questions
